item.radiomod.capacitor.tooltip: Capacitor stores electric charges for a while
item.radiomod.transistor.tooltip: Solid-state element amplifying or switching electic signals
item.radiomod.diode.tooltip: Solid-state element that let signal pass only in one direction
item.radiomod.coil.tooltip: Coil can store energy in magnetic field that it's creating
item.radiomod.resistor.tooltip: Resistor creates additional resistance in circuit and lowers current
item.radiomod.transformer.tooltip: Transformer changes voltage of the circuit
block.radiomod.circuit_block.tooltip: Block where you can assemble electric circuits
